author: m.kalinin
content: it should work unless we're planning Devcon/DevConnect in Petra

author: timbeiko
content:
Opened the Meta EIP PR for Dencun: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8006
Also checked all the included EIPs and opened a PR for the only one that was still in draft: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8009

Lastly, here's a "Meta Meta EIP" linking back to the specs for all of the hard forks for which we didn't have Meta EIPs. It simply lists specs, rather than trying to "copy over" what was done elsewhere: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8005
